meanings.sent1: The personating clown entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore a personating mask to the masquerade ball.
meanings.sent3: The personating detective solved the mystery in a surprising way.
meanings.sent4: Her personating skills were so convincing, she could fool anyone.
meanings.sent5: The actor's personating performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Acting as if one is another person.
meanings.sent1: The personating student imitated the teacher's mannerisms perfectly.
meanings.sent2: He put on a personating voice to mimic his favorite character.
meanings.sent3: The personating actor made everyone laugh with his hilarious impressions.
meanings.sent4: She was so good at personating that she could fool even her closest friends.
meanings.sent5: The personating comedian had the audience rolling with laughter.
